newProperties.name: cloud_topics_epoch_service_epoch_increment_interval
newProperties.description: The interval at which the cluster epoch is incremented.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_epoch_service_local_epoch_cache_duration
newProperties.description: The local cache duration of a cluster wide epoch.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_short_term_gc_backoff_interval
newProperties.description: The interval between invocations of the L0 garbage collection work loop when no progress is being made or errors are occurring.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_short_term_gc_interval
newProperties.description: The interval between invocations of the L0 garbage collection work loop when progress is being made.

newProperties.name: cloud_topics_short_term_gc_minimum_object_age
newProperties.description: The minimum age of an L0 object before it becomes eligible for garbage collection.

newProperties.name: fetch_max_read_concurrency
newProperties.description: The maximum number of concurrent partition reads per fetch request on each shard. Setting this higher than the default can lead to partition starvation and unneeded memory usage.

newProperties.name: log_compaction_tx_batch_removal_enabled
newProperties.description: Enables removal of transactional control batches during compaction. These batches are removed according to a topic's configured delete.retention.ms, and only if the topic's cleanup.policy allows compaction.
